content:
EAT /
EMPLOYEES
ONLY
RESTAURANT

NYC's beloved speakeasy, Employees Only, will make its first foray outside Manhattan with a Miami debut at Washington Park Hotel, proudly becoming the hotel's signature restaurant. Opening in September 2016, Employees Only will be nestled into our historic coral house, inhabiting the intimate essence of its renowned NYC counterpart in its new, tropical outpost. Check back often for more details and follow us on social for the latest news.
